name: Hulk
description: It is a highly detailed action figure with movable joints and accessories. It is suitable for children above the age of 5.

name: Iron Man
description: It is a set of colorful building blocks that promote creativity and imagination. It comes with a storage box for easy organization.

name: Stormtroopers
description: It is a beautiful doll with realistic features and a variety of outfits. It is ideal for collectors and doll enthusiasts.

name: Master Yoda
description: It is is a challenging puzzle with 500 pieces. It features a vibrant and captivating image that will keep you entertained for hours.

name: Optimus Prime
description: It is a remote control car that can perform stunts and maneuvers. It provides hours of fun for both kids and adults.

name: Bumblebee
description: It is an educational toy that teaches basic math and language skills. It is designed to make learning enjoyable for young children.
